response.overview: His love of film began as an escape from a rocky childhood. From underdog to Hollywood legend, Sylvester Stallone tells his story in this documentary.
response.tagline: Meet the man behind the hero.
response.title: Sly

results.name: Thom Zimny on Documenting the Enigmatic Life of Sylvester Stallone | TIFF 2023
TIFF 2023 | Q&A with Sylvester Stallone and Thom Zimny
